attributes.action: strongly support the proposed Wind Turbines in the Thames Estuary & off the Thanet Coast
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Much hot air has been written about the effect of wind turbines on bird life. A recent article in the 'New Scientist' entitled 'Wind turbines a breeze for migrating birds' shows clearly that the effect is negligible. We shouldn't allow well-meaning but mis-guided people stand in the way of one of the best ways of reducing our CO2 emissions.
